title: Virco Announces Quarterly Cash Dividend
text:
TORRANCE, Calif., March 14, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Virco Mfg. Corporation (NASDAQ:VIRC) today announced a quarterly cash dividend of $0.015 per share of common stock, payable April 10, 2018 to shareholders of record as of March 23, 2018.
Robert A. Virtue, Chairman and CEO, said: “I’m pleased to report that Virco shareholders will again receive a quarterly cash dividend, reflecting our stronger financial condition and favorable prospect for our market. We have always strived to provide our shareholders with a balanced set of returns consisting of share price appreciation, regular cash dividends, and opportunistic repurchases. As our financial position continues to improve, we look forward to extending this return portfolio.”
